Title: Requires every internet service provider to provide a list of the addresses served by such provider to the public service commission
Summary: Requires every internet service provider to provide a list of the addresses served by such provider to the public service commission and update such list no less than annually.
LawCode: Add ยง119-d, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring every internet service provider to provide a list of the addresses served by such provider to the public service commission
